experience: You and Vickie both know Aric Zion, Matthew O'Brien, and 28 others

Strategic, finance and accounting consulting:-Interim CFO-Interim Controller-Full accounting services-Restatements, clean up and analysis of financial statements and general ledger-Balance sheet analysis-Monthly or quarterly review of bookkeeper or staff accountant financial work-Tax preparation work-Specialty in deal due diligence - debt and equity offerings-Prepare for 409a valuation-Establish and report against KPIs-Payroll, 1099s and benefit reporting-Financial, accounting and HR platform migration-Family office servicesPassionate about start-ups, willing to work in exchange or partial exchange for equity compensation in some cases.  Specialize in building systems and fixing and cleaning up prior work.  Have significant due diligence experience for IPOs, debt and equity financing transactions and merger/acquisition.Current clients include software and service companies and pooled investment funds.

Acting CFO for Tallwave LLC and multiple portfolio companies including Ethology (digital marketing agency), Shelvspace (software), SOOH Media (social networking and advertising platform), Tallwave Commercialization Fund (funding early and mid-stage tech companies) and Sycara (SEO software).  Accomplishments:-Brought all companies current with financial reporting-Established monthly accurate and timely reporting in industry standard formats-Established annual budgeting and planning and reporting against budgets-Established regular, timely board reporting-Successfully sold assets of SEO software company-Integrated acquisition of design and development firm-Implemented employee utilization reporting to push accountability and drive EBITDA profits in service businesses

Unicorn Media, Inc. is the leading provider of Internet video solutions that enable companies to maximize IP video profitability. Our patented technology, Unicorn Once™, allows customers to ingest video content one time and deliver it to every Internet-connected device via a single URL. Content owners can monetize their live or VOD content on any device by dynamically inserting targeted ads and analyzing content and ad performance in real-time on every platform, allowing for on-the-fly changes to maximize profitability. One of 5 starting employees, I oversee financial operations including financial statement preparation, budgeting, forecasting, data analysis, financial modeling and treasury functions, as well as raising over $20 million in private equity offerings.  Successfully completed the acquisition of Unicorn Media by Brightcove, Inc. in three months.
Consulted with clients such as Limelight Networks while providing due diligence support for a private equity offering with Goldman Sachs in 2006 and successful  $250M IPO in 2007.

recommendations: Sr. Director, Account Management at DLVR
September 16, 2014, Vickie was senior to Hannah but didn’t manage directly

It’s rare that you come across a standout talent like Hannah.  I had the pleasure of working with Hannah for several years at Unicorn Media.  As the CFO of a fast-paced, rapidly growing company with few resources, I relied heavily on Hannah to provide detailed information from the sales field.  The valuable data that Hannah regularly provided in a concise, efficient manner was highly beneficial to me and other company executives.  Along with her attention to detail with sales analysis, I was particularly impressed with Hannah’s ability to handle even the toughest clients – and seemingly effortlessly.  That skill often takes years to develop but seemed to come naturally to her.  In addition, her ability to juggle multiple projects was unlike any I’ve seen and made a dramatic difference to the productivity level of our team.  As a team member or a leader, Hannah earns my highest recommendation.
